page.title: 05The Sea.
page.content: Sutton is situated on the East coast of Britain by the North Sea.The sea is important because it attracts holiday makers who bring trade.Because of the visitors who come to the sea we have more shops than other villages our size. We get floods in winter which we get used to.{Lifeboats:}it is always dangerous for a small boat to go to sea but for large ships the worst time is from October to November.We get about 4 ships sunk yearly off this coast and around 1500 in difficulty.When a ship has problems and the lifeboat cannot get next to it they fire a rocket over the ship and the crew on the wreck fasten the rope to a mast.Then two more ropes are sent one with a lifebuoy and the crew are winched over to the lifeboat.{ {
